channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Appallingly bad 200 metre stretch of road., 13th August
item.description:
Pothole after pothole after pothole. It’s been like this for at least 2 years.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Raised curbstone that wobbles, 13th August
item.description:
Wobbling curbstone causing issues on drive . Wobbles left and right and is very raised when driving over it . Needs taking out and clearing and setting back down again please . 13 aug 2013

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1c, Hayden Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole, 13th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Pothole Forming, 11th August
item.description:
A pothole is forming quickly on the M5 Southbound about 1/2 mile of Junction 10. There are others before it, but you can't miss this one as it's just on the driver side wheel and could be dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inactive roadworks - badly positioned., 10th August
item.description:
There has been a barrier up around a small road work in this location for well over a month, and no action. It is exactly where cars have to turn in from Hucclecote Road, which is very busy and also cars approaching the junction on Green Lane. This is an accident waiting to happen and the roadworks need to be completed as soon as possible. Yeah there has been no action for quite some time. I suggest that this is the remedied ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
